attributes.additional_details: If we scrap 1p's and 2p's then companies cant sell an item for example £9.99. This would mean the company would make an extra penny. The average to below person most probably wouldnt miss the penny. The amount of transactions companies in the UK do everyday with an extra penny would add to millions I believe. Therefore boosting profits economy, growth and hopefully employment. Also you dont have annoying copper. #killoffcopper
